manifest.name: Tenor Saxophone - Modal Exploration
manifest.description: Explore the major and minor modes on the tenor saxophone.

front: Explore the major scale in the key of C major in your tenor saxophone using primarily second intervals.
Explore the minor scale in the equivalent minor mode to C major in your tenor saxophone using primarily second intervals.
